reviewText: Dark Passion is the usual made for television soft core porn with a little mystery and suspense to help maintain the audience along with the erotic performances of the cast. The film centers around a new care taker that is hired by an unfaithful, successful plastic surgeon. Throughout the movie, mysterious threats of blackmail and murder begin to unfold revolving around the plastic surgeons beautiful, unfaithful wife, her lover (the caretaker), and the plastic surgeons attractive, estranged daughter.
